il.co.server

Class ActivityDBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.co.server.ActivityDBManager

  • public class ActivityDBManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ActivityDBManager is a class that handle all of the data base activity such as : insert,update,delete.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    v5.0
    Author:
    Shmulik Melamed, Lital Motola

    • Method Detail

      • insertActivity

        public void insertActivity(java.lang.String serial,
                  java.lang.String gpsCity,
                  java.lang.String speed,
                  java.lang.String gpsAlt,
                  java.lang.String gpsLat,
                  java.lang.String gpsLon,
                  java.lang.String gpsLat2,
                  java.lang.String gpsLon2,
                  java.lang.String gpsLat3,
                  java.lang.String gpsLon3,
                  java.lang.String dis1,
                  java.lang.String dis2,
                  java.lang.String battL,
                  java.lang.String batt,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.String status)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Added in API level 1 Called when we wand to insert new information to the database.
        Parameters:
        serial - - Serial that the drone application generated.
        gpsCity - - GPS City.
        gpsAlt - - GPS Altitude.
        speed - - drone speed.
        gpsLat - - GPS Start Latitude.
        gpsLon - - GPS Start Longitude.
        gpsLat2 - - GPS Current Latitude.
        gpsLon2 - - GPS Current Longitude.
        gpsLat3 - - GPS End Latitude.
        gpsLon3 - - GPS End Longitude.
        battL - - Battery Phone Level.
        batt - - Battery Drone Level.
        dis1 - - distance from start to end point.
        dis2 - - distance from current to end point.
        type - - type of the drone : game,police,transfer.
        status - - drone status on/off.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        1.0

      • updateActivity

        public void updateActivity(java.lang.String serial,
                  java.lang.String gpsCity,
                  java.lang.String speed,
                  java.lang.String gpsAlt,
                  java.lang.String gpsLat,
                  java.lang.String gpsLon,
                  java.lang.String gpsDestLat,
                  java.lang.String gpsDestLon,
                  java.lang.String dis1,
                  java.lang.String dis2,
                  java.lang.String battd,
                  java.lang.String battp,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.String status)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Added in API level 1 Called when we wand to update specific information by id in the database.
        Parameters:
        gpsCity - - GPS City.
        gpsAlt - - GPS Altitude.
        speed - - drone speed.
        gpsLat - - GPS Start Latitude.
        gpsLon - - GPS Start Longitude.
        gpsDestLat - - GPS End Latitude.
        gpsDestLon - - GPS End Longitude.
        dis1 - - distance from start to end point.
        dis2 - - distance from current to end point.
        battd - - Battery Drone Level.
        battp - - Battery Phone Level.
        type - - type of the drone : game,police,transfer.
        status - - drone status on/off.
        serial - - Serial that the drone application generated.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        1.0

      • upsertActivity

        public void upsertActivity(java.lang.String serial,
                  java.lang.String gpsCity,
                  java.lang.String gpsAlt,
                  java.lang.String speed,
                  java.lang.String gpsLat,
                  java.lang.String gpsLon,
                  java.lang.String gpsDestLat,
                  java.lang.String gpsDestLon,
                  java.lang.String dis1,
                  java.lang.String dis2,
                  java.lang.String battd,
                  java.lang.String battp,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.String status)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Added in API level 1 Called when we wand to upsert information to the database. upsert means that we check by serial if the information is in the database, if no then he use insert method and if yes then he use the update method.
        Parameters:
        serial - - Serial that the drone application generated.
        gpsCity - - GPS City.
        gpsAlt - - GPS Altitude.
        speed - - drone speed.
        gpsLat - - GPS Start Latitude.
        gpsLon - - GPS Start Longitude.
        gpsDestLat - - GPS End Latitude.
        gpsDestLon - - GPS End Longitude.
        dis1 - - distance from start to end point.
        dis2 - - distance from current to end point.
        battd - - Battery Drone Level.
        battp - - Battery Phone Level.
        type - - type of the drone : game,police,transfer.
        status - - drone status on/off.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        1.0
